How to connect shopify channel on mobile app?

To add a Shopify channel to Shiprocket mobile app 
1. Begin by clicking the 'More' option at the bottom of your Shiprocket app.
2. Next, click on 'Channel Integrations' dropdown from the menu.
3. Proceed by clicking on 'Integrate with Shopify'.
4. In this section, you will see all the channels currently added to your account. To add a new channel, click on the plus icon. 
5. Input your store URL in the designated field and click on 'Connect to Shopify' to initiate the connection.
6. You will then be redirected to the Shopify seller login page. Here, enter your email ID and password, or log in using Gmail or other available options. 
7. Once logged in, the app auhtorization page will open where you can verify your account integration with Shiprocket by clicking "Install app".
8. Now, you will be redirected to the Shiprocket channel page. Here, you can edit your shopify channel to modify it as per your preferences.
